channel.title: Tops on David D. Hofmann
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on David D. Hofmann

item.description: Hi there! My name is David D. Hofmann and I am a PhD student in ecology at the University of Zurich in Switzerland. Prior to my PhD, I did a masterâ€™s degree in economics and soonafter a master’s degree in environmental sciences. The latter ultimatelly led to my current position as a PhD student. My research interests mainly include spatial data analysis, remote sensing, movement ecology, and conservation science. Together with my colleagues at Popecol, I am currently working on the African wild dog dispersal project in Botswana.
